name: Acme Mobile
overview:
Acme Mobile is Southeast Asia’s leading distributor of mobile entertainment content. Headquartered in Singapore and with offices in Bangkok and Manila, Acme Mobile offers three distinct distribution options to its partners:

  • Traditional B2B distribution via carrier decks and 3rd-party portals, covering some 12 Asian countries and more than 60 live channels

  • Direct to consumer via its family of “Amob.com” web and WAP sites (www.amob.com and wap.amob.com), across 6 Southeast Asian countries, covering 18 carriers and reaching over 250 million mobile subscribers in local language formats

  • Custom delivery solutions, such as branded “white label” storefronts, mobile marketing campaigns and ad hoc delivery.

Acme Mobile works with such leading brands as EA Mobile, Glu, THQ Wireless, Eidos Mobile, Vivendi Games Mobile, MTV Asia, the Barclays Premiere League and many more.
